participant_1.background:
I'm not very concerned about my appearance, as long as I look presentable.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
My eyes are too weak to see the world clearly, but my bones are strong enough to withstand a beating.
I love watching romantic comedies and listening to the Red Hot Chili Peppers.

participant_2.background:
I have a dog and a cat, and they are my best friends.
I take my iguana outside to bask in the sun.
I have two weaknesses: my eyes and my driving skills.
I miss being able to run around in the woods behind my house without a care in the world.
My family is not involved in my career.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
It's going well! I'm getting ready to go for a walk in the woods behind my house.
That sounds like fun! I wish I could see the woods behind my house, but I live in an apartment.
Oh, that's too bad. I love spending time in the woods. It's so peaceful and quiet.
I can imagine. I love hearing the birds singing and the wind rustling through the leaves.
What kind of animals do you see in the woods?
I see all sorts of animals, like deer, rabbits, and squirrels. I even saw a bear once!
Wow, that's amazing! I've never seen a bear in the wild.
They're not too common, but they're definitely out there.
I'm sure they are. I'm glad you're able to enjoy the woods behind your house. I wish I could.
You should come visit me sometime! I'll show you around.
I'd love to! Thanks for the offer.
No problem! It's always nice to meet new people who appreciate the outdoors.
